Welcome to my portfolio site, My name is Saowaluck.

I'm constantly learning software technologies and programming to improve my skills. With a background in customer service I am transitioning to tech with adaptability, intuition, and an endless amount of curiosity. I possess a strong passion for integrative problem solving, creative design as well as reading and writing code that is aimed to fulfill a users experience.
